cz.agents.alite.cross.simulation
Class SimulationEntity

java.lang.Object
  cz.agents.alite.entity.Entity
      cz.agents.alite.cross.simulation.SimulationEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventHandler
public abstract class SimulationEntity
extends Entity
implements EventHandler

Simulation entity represents an object directly interacting in the Simulation. Also, it is an default implementation of the EventHandler interface usable together with the Simulation. Note: An agents is not an extension of a SimulationEntity, since the agent do not represent the physical body. The agent is only a "brain" controlling its body through the Sensors and Actions of an UrbanSimEnvironment.

Author:
Antonin Komenda
